.instructor__info img{width:20px;height:20px}.swiper__wrapper{padding:2rem 0}.swiper{user-select:none}.review{font-size:16px;padding:5px}.review,.review__card{position:relative;display:flex}.review__card{width:100%;padding:2rem 0}@media Super-Italic,sans-serif;color:#c0f;font-size:15px;font-weight:600}.swiper-slide{filter:blur(2px)!important;-webkit-filter:blur(2px)!important;transform:scale(.8)!important;-webkit-transform:scale(.8)!important;-moz-transform:scale(.8)!important;-ms-transform:scale(.8)!important;-o-transform:scale(.8)!important;transition:all .2s;-webkit-transition:all .2s;-moz-transition:all .2s;-ms-transition:all .2s;-o-transition:all .2s}.swiper-slide-active{filter:blur(0)!important;-webkit-filter:blur(0)!important;transform:scale(1)!important;-webkit-transform:scale(1)!important;-moz-transform:scale(1)!important;-ms-transform:scale(1)!important;-o-transform:scale(1)!important}.swiper__tools{position:relative;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:space-between;margin-top:6rem;padding:0 4rem 0 2rem}.swiper__buttons{display:flex}.swiper__buttons button{position:relative;background:transparent;padding:1rem 3rem;border-radius:50px;-webkit-border-radius:50px;-moz-border-radius:50px;-ms-border-radius:50px;-o-border-radius:50px;border:1px solid #fff;margin-right:2rem;user-select:none}.swiper__buttons button:after{display:none}.swiper__buttons button img{filter:invert(100%);-webkit-filter:invert(100%)}.swiper__buttons button:first-of-type{transform:rotate(180deg);-webkit-transform:rotate(180deg);-moz-transform:rotate(180deg);-ms-transform:rotate(180deg);-o-transform:rotate(180deg)}.swiper__buttons button:hover{background:hsla(0,0%,100%,.1294117647)}.swiper-pagination{position:relative;display:none}
